div.p: This is a draft for what an ATNA Audit Record (RFC 3881) might look like if provided as a FHIR resource. This is work in progress performed collaboratively between HL7 and IHE for the MHD/mHealth initiatives. Neither HL7 nor IHE is committed to pursuing this path - it is simply being evaluated as a possibility.
Things to note about the current design:

ul.li: In this resource, the Participant Object Detail from RFC 3881 is handled as standard FHIR extensions to the object element

div.p: Servers that provide support for Security Event resources should not accept update or delete operations on the resources.
